channel.title: RavenSword Development Thread (#StatusPending Map)
channel.description:
People of this community, im not aware of how noticeable this forum actually is from my point of view right now, but im sure i'de find out.
im currently developing a "MMORPG", im in need of some help! im currently looking for a team to develop this project as myself and other developer arn't that good with (Graphics) Mainly...
Required Information Below..
(Skills (CodeMethod) Contact Methods Reason for wanting to team?
just some simple questions. feel free to message me privately on here. this is an onGoing project shortly will show some pictures or maybe video's of it so far...
(Please Don't Comment If Your Going To Rage)
##UPDATED## #1# Inventory System Leveling System
##UPDATE## ##2##
Quest System AI System + General Drops Teleports Character Selection
(Images will be up soon waiting on a map)
If anyone know's a RPG Map Scene, made with Unity. please feel free to Send me the link as im no good with graphic design so i wanna record the Game so you can all see but no level made yet..
thanks for the comments/Views

item.title: RavenSword Development Thread (#StatusPending Map)
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

[quote=“ravensword, post:7, topic:538425”][quote author=Docent link=topic=657250.msg4396979#msg4396979 date=1389457228]
Don’t forget to make everything be designed for multiplayer. RPG’s are much different that MMORPG’s. For example, in an RPG you can have monsters increase their health and damage output as the player increases, however on a MMORPG, that doesn’t apply, you need to make separate areas for different level monsters like RuneScape because not everyone is a high level.

Otherwise, good luck!
[/quote]
thank you for the information…
uh the players randomly get put into a world with (the level monsters 10Leser or 10Greater then what the player actually is. i began my project with a $300 kit… so im getting there.[/quote]

Link to the Kit you are using.

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword Development Thread (#StatusPending Map)
item.dc:creator: @ravensword ravensword
item.description:
@ravensword wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:6, topic:538425”]Don’t forget to make everything be designed for multiplayer. RPG’s are much different that MMORPG’s. For example, in an RPG you can have monsters increase their health and damage output as the player increases, however on a MMORPG, that doesn’t apply, you need to make separate areas for different level monsters like RuneScape because not everyone is a high level.

Otherwise, good luck![/quote]
thank you for the information…
uh the players randomly get put into a world with (the level monsters 10Leser or 10Greater then what the player actually is. i began my project with a $300 kit… so im getting there.

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword Development Thread (#StatusPending Map)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Don’t forget to make everything be designed for multiplayer. RPG’s are much different that MMORPG’s. For example, in an RPG you can have monsters increase their health and damage output as the player increases, however on a MMORPG, that doesn’t apply, you need to make separate areas for different level monsters like RuneScape because not everyone is a high level.

Otherwise, good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword Development Thread (#StatusPending Map)
item.dc:creator: @ravensword ravensword
item.description:
@ravensword wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:4, topic:538425”][quote author=ravensword link=topic=657250.msg4396947#msg4396947 date=1389442271]

I was pretty sure i heard that name before : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crescentmoongames.ravensword2

But good luck anyway ;D

Nope that’s not me Sir!, However Read as i have said. (DEVELOPMENT) The Above link you sent was a FULL Completed game. however i’m not aware of that existence until now.

(sorry my English is bad)
[/quote]

Yeah i know its in development , i was just telling you that there is a game named like that nothing else ( not hating ).
Also can you post some pictures of what have you done so far?[/quote]

Yes Sir!.. im doing some more work on it then i will upload some picture’s… also i understand completely where your coming from…

Just remember, developing a game isnt for the fame. just remember its only a game.

Read full topic
